message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this fantastic product. Given its value and potential, I'm asking for $18,000. I'm confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I believe that's a fair price considering its value.

Bob, I appreciate your interest. While $12,000 is a tempting offer, the true value of this product is significantly higher. I'm willing to come down to $16,000.  I believe this price reflects a fair deal for both of us.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, so I'll offer $14,000. I believe that's a fair price for both of us.
Bob, you clearly recognize the value of this product. Let's close this deal - I'm willing to accept $15,000. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm willing to go up to $13,500, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. I believe that's a fair price for the product.
